title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it is changing with settings
OB: When the user clicks on the "OK" button and then reopens the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that the title of the hyperlink builder becomes "www.actuate.com" instead of "Hyperlink Options".
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should remain as "Hyperlink Options".
SR:
To reproduce: Set a label hyperlink as "www.actuate.com" and follow these steps:
1. Click on the "OK" button.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
